Use Windows Alt codes on macOS and Linux, thanks to Espanso.

## Usage

| Trigger     | Replacement |
| ----------- | ----------- |
| `:alt1:`    | ☺           |
| `:alt2:`    | ☻           |
| `:alt3:`    | ♥           |
| `:alt4:`    | ♦           |
| `:alt5:`    | ♣           |
| `:alt6:`    | ♠           |
| `:alt7:`    | •           |
| `:alt8:`    | ◘           |
